constituent: song, cancan, can, mouth, street, nail, spike, lack, yawn, can2, mouth2, street2, nail2, spike2
heisigStory: The song in this kanji is being sung by a chorus line of can-can girls. Why it should be eliciting nothing but yawning from the audience, I leave to you to decide.
koohiiStory1: Can-Can-ers lack the ability to sing a song, so they just dance.
koohiiStory2: Can-can dancers are supposed to be big-bosomed girls who dance. Yet these so called can-can dancers are flat-chested and singing a song, so audience of men is yawning in boredom.
myStory: bài hát. có thể hai lần vẫn thiếu tiếng hát. luyện hát nhiều lần vẫn thiếu khả năng
readingExamples: 歌 (うた), 歌う (うた.う)
words:
短歌(たんか): tanka, 31-syllable Japanese poem
歌手(かしゅ): singer
歌謡(かよう): song, ballad
歌(うた): song, poetry
歌う(うたう): sing
